snippet: Climate change attributable to human behavior “may have done a little bit of an add-on,” the study’s lead author said.
abstract: National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration reports California's extreme drought is caused by natural climate variability over past three years; says climate change brought about by humans has played little role.
lead_paragraph: Climate change attributable to human behavior “may have done a little bit of an add-on,” the study’s lead author said.

headline.main: California Drought Is Said to Have Natural Cause
headline.print_headline: California Drought Is Said to Have Natural Cause
